block.p: The Department of Defense has identified 3,502 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It confirmed the following deaths yesterday:
FENDER, Llythaniele, 21, Cpl., Army; Medical Lake, Wash.; Fifth Battalion, Fifth Air Defense Artillery.
HEROLD, Adam G., 23, Specialist, Army; Omaha; 25th Infantry Division.
NGIRAKED, Meresebang, 21, Cpl., Army; Koror, Republic of Palau; Fifth Battalion, Fifth Air Defense Artillery.
The Department of Defense has identified 3,502 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It confirmed the following deaths yesterday:.
